about.title: About Help and Offer
about.description: Help and Offer is a platform designed to connect people who need help with those who can offer assistance. Our mission is to create a community of mutual support and cooperation.
about.requestHelpDesc: Post your request for assistance with a clear title and detailed description.
about.offerHelpDesc: Browse through requests and offer your help where you can make a difference.
about.connectDesc: Once a match is made, connect with the person and provide the help needed.
about.missionDesc: To create a platform that connects people in need with those who can help, fostering a community of mutual support and cooperation.
about.visionDesc: A world where people can easily find help and offer assistance, creating stronger communities and improving lives.
about.closed: Closed on Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays
about.contactDesc: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
about.subject: Subject
about.emailPrivacy: Your email will not be shared with third parties
